  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */
	data.hub = {};
	data.tabs = [];
	
	var hubid = $sp.getParameter("sys_hubid");
	data.hubid = hubid;
	
	var hubgr = new GlideRecord("topic");
	if(hubgr.get(hubid)){
		// get hub details
		data.hub.name = hubgr.getValue("name");
		data.hub.desc = hubgr.getValue("description");
		data.hub.banner = hubgr.getValue("banner_image");
		data.hub.parenthub = String(hubgr.parent_topic.name);
		data.hub.parenthubid = hubgr.getValue("parent_topic");
		
		// get contents
		var grcon = new GlideRecord("m2m_connected_content");
		grcon.addQuery("topic", hubid);
		grcon.addEncodedQuery("knowledge.latest=true^knowledge.workflow_state=published");
		grcon.orderBy("order");
		
		grcon.setLimit(1);
		
		grcon.query();
		
		var kbwoptions = {};
		kbwoptions.hide_article_header = true;
		
		while(grcon.next()){
			var contobj = {};
			contobj.id = grcon.getUniqueValue();
			contobj.name = String(grcon.knowledge.short_description);
			contobj.kb = String(grcon.knowledge.number);
			contobj.content = String(grcon.knowledge.text);
			contobj.kbid = String(grcon.knowledge.sys_id);
			
			kbwoptions.sys_kb_id = contobj.kbid;
			
			contobj.article = $sp.getWidget('sk_kba_content_hub2', kbwoptions);
			
			data.tabs.push(contobj);
		}
	}

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-22 02:55:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>2898f41e2fb0111057ab7f572799b678</sys_id><sys_mod_count>50</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hub</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_2898f41e2fb0111057ab7f572799b678</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-27 04:32:08</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="hub-main">
